name: Beyond the Horizon
description: From darkness to light. Travel through 11 zones of relaxation. A VR experience with a unique move mechanic you control with your body.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: PC should be VR Ready
